column5: hi all does any body know if you can rent a cam for a weekend to try.would like to before buying just see if i like it.jamie
i have the cheapest one Fishtv and works great, if u go ice fishing walk around and u will see people using underwater cams, just take peek and u will fall in love with it.
Check with Doug or Daphne at Travel Sports on Wharncliffe. If it's available in Londom they'll know about it.  JohnF

Well, if you wern't so far away you could borrow mine for a weekend, they sure are fun to use, if you can make it to the "fishing for Tyler" weekend in Feb. I'll bring mine along and you can try it for the day.
Jamie where you been?  You're welcome to borrow mine if you're coming through Barrie any time.
hey all thanks for the offers thats very nice.jamie
